statements.statement: with temp as ( select *,row_number() over(order by StartDate desc) as row from SWfsIndexNewArrival where PageNo='index' AND PagePositionNo='INDEX_NA' AND DataState=1 and status=1 ) select * from temp where row between (@pageIndex-1)*@pageSize+1 and @pageIndex*@pageSize order by startdate desc

SELECT B.ProductNo , PE.ProductShowPic ProductPicFile FROM SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList B INNER JOIN SpProduct C ON B.ProductNo = C.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend PE ON B.ProductNo = PE.ProductNo LEFT JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM dbo.SpfSkuExtend skue WHERE skue.PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS t ON t.ProductNo=b.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS brand ON C.BrandNo=brand.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpBrandExtend AS be ON be.BrandNo=brand.BrandNo WHERE B.NewArrivalId = @NewArrivalId AND B.DataState = 1 AND B.status = 1 AND PE.TypeFlag=1 ORDER BY sortvalue DESC
select count(*) from SWfsIndexNewArrival where PageNo='index' AND PagePositionNo='INDEX_NA' AND DataState=1 and status=1

SELECT p.ProductNo , p.ProductModel GoodsNo , x.Status , p.ProductName , pe.ProductShowPic AS ProductPicFile , x.sortvalue , brand.BrandCnName , brand.BrandEnName FROM SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList x INNER JOIN Spproduct AS p ON x.ProductNo=p.ProductNo INNER JOIN SpfProductExtend AS pe ON pe.ProductNo=x.ProductNo LEFT JOIN (SELECT ProductNo FROM SpfSkuExtend(NOLOCK) WHERE PcSaleState=2 GROUP BY ProductNo) AS b ON b.ProductNo=x.ProductNo LEFT JOIN SpBrand AS brand ON p.BrandNo=brand.BrandNo LEFT JOIN SpBrandExtend AS be ON be.BrandNo=brand.BrandNo WHERE NewArrivalId = @NewArrivalId AND x.DataState = 1 AND pe.TypeFlag = 1 AND x.status = 1 ORDER BY x.SortValue DESC

SELECT sku.ProductNo, sku.PcShowState, sku.DisabledState, sku.PcSaleState AS IsShelf, sku.PcShelfDate as DateShelf , price.GoldPrice , price.PlatinumPrice , price.DiamondPrice , price.StandardPrice , price.MarketPrice , price.PromotionPrice FROM SpfSkuExtend AS sku ( NOLOCK ) INNER JOIN SpfSkuPrice AS price ( NOLOCK ) ON price.SkuNo = sku.SkuNo WHERE sku.PcShowState = 1 AND sku.PcSaleState = 2 AND sku.DataState=1 AND sku.ProductNo = @ProductNo
update SWfsIndexNewArrival set DataState=255 where NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId; update SWfsIndexNewArrivalProductList set DataState=255 where NewArrivalId=@NewArrivalId;
select count(*) from SWfsIndexNewArrival where StartDate=@StartDate and DataState=1 and status=1 and NewArrivalId != @NewArrivalId
